Dutiya Sutta：1．Dutiya Sutta.-On the four modes of progress：painful with sluggish intuition and with swift intuition，and pleasant，with the same two varieties of intuition．A.ii.154.



2．Dutiya Sutta.-Questions asked by a deva and the Buddha’s reply thereto．”What has a good man as his companion?” is one question，and the reply thereto is ”faith.” （S.i.38）.
